I'm getting the same problem... Using VS 2013 Express for Web and MVC 4

I did too but I fixed it.
I created the file from scratch as instructed with the prescribed name in the Views AND then I had to add a _ViewStart.cshtml file; also in the Views directory that simply had:

@{
   Layout = "~/Views/Shared/_Layout.cshtml";   }
in it. and then I was off and running. Then, I was off and running till step 5 where I can not create the StoreManagerController for the LIFE of me...

But, anyhow... that's how to fix the _layout issue... Good Luck...
